title: Xero Reconciliation  Bookkeeping
job_overview:
About Us:

Jara Trading is a fast-growing eCommerce business committed to providing high-quality products and excellent customer service. As we scale, we’re looking for a detail-oriented and reliable Xero Reconciliation  Bookkeeping to manage our financial records.

Key Responsibilities:
- Maintain up-to-date financial records in Xero, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
- Liaise with our accountant to prepare for VAT returns and end-of-year filing.
- Identify and resolve discrepancies or data entry issues in financial records.
- Admin Excel & Google Sheet Tasks

Send us your resume and answer the following items below together with a brief cover letter highlighting your experience with Xero and bookkeeping and excel/google sheets skills.

1. What is your expected hourly rate (in USD)?
2. What are you currently doing (freelancing, employed, etc.)?
3. What was your most recent role and responsibilities?
4. How is your English communication skills (spoken and written)?
5. How would you rate your Excel proficiency?
6. Do you have experience with any of the following?
      Ecommerce bookkeeping
      Shipping & VAT
      Software/tools used
      Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)
7. Are you comfortable working on a graveyard shift (5pm-1am PH time)?
8. Are you open to completing a trial task if shortlisted?

We’re excited to meet detail-driven professionals who are ready to help Jara Trading grow!

https://jaratrading.co.uk
